name: Coffee Time (NathanWhitehead)
description:
This is my 7th game in my one week game series!

Welcome to Coffee Time! A cafe with only one barista, which is you, making coffee for customers in a fast paced environment! 

Will you be able to beat all 5 levels and be a certified barista?

Controls:

WASD to move around

Spacebar to interact with things, pick up cups, make coffee, etc.

Did you know I make a new game every week? If you enjoyed this game consider following my YouTube to see what games I'm making here: One Week Games - YouTube and follow my instagram page if you want daily updates on the current game I'm making here: Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos
